original_text: After three months we set sail in a ship that had wintered in the island, a ship of Alexandria, with the twin gods as a figurehead.
korean_text: 석 달 후에 우리가 그 섬에서 겨울을 난 알렉산드리아 배를 타고 떠나니 그 배의 머리 장식은 디오스구로라

sentences.original_text: we set sail in a ship
that had wintered in the island
with the twin gods as a figurehead
sentences.korean_translation: 쌍둥이 신상을 배의 장식으로 달고 있었다
